content: until 1 75 less than desired foot length toe begin toe decreases round 1 k to last 3 stitches on n2 k2tog k1 on n1 k1 ssk knit across to last 3 stitches k2tog k1 on n2 k1 ssk knit to end of round one decrease round complete round 2 knit one round knit these 2 rounds until you have 12 stitches left on each needle to finish the socks use a kitchener stitch to close the toe and weave in all your ends block your socks with your preferred method chart is read from bottom to top and right to left abbreviations k2tog knit 2 stitches together p2tog purl 2 stitches together ssk slip slip knit p purl k knit sl slip as if to purl rs right side ws wrong side pm place stitch marker co cast on pu pick up n- needle tbl through back loop co cast on pattern & photography by olivia villarreal for personal use only pattern support email olive villarreal@yahoo com
